mapper.select: SELECT worksheet_id, amount, w.machine_id, machine_name, w.product_id, product_name, w.worker_id, worker_name, create_datetime FROM WORKSHEET w JOIN MACHINE m ON m.machine_id = w.machine_id JOIN PRODUCT p ON p.product_id = w.product_id JOIN WORKER wk ON wk.worker_id = w.worker_id

SELECT worksheet_id, amount, w.machine_id, machine_name, w.product_id, product_name, w.worker_id, worker_name, create_datetime FROM WORKSHEET w JOIN MACHINE m ON m.machine_id = w.machine_id JOIN PRODUCT p ON p.product_id = w.product_id JOIN WORKER wk ON wk.worker_id = w.worker_id WHERE w.machine_id = #{machineId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WORKSHEET (amount, machine_id, product_id, worker_id, create_datetime) VALUES (#{amount}, #{machineId}, #{productId}, #{workerId}, NOW())
